result.eng: He would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.
result.ga: Bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iad
result.orig: Bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iad
result.html: Bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iadHe would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.
result.ponchtml: Ḃeaḋ sé ag loiceaḋ air féin dá dtréigfeaḋ sé anois iadHe would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.

result.eng: Osama Bin Laden would certainly be laughing.
result.ga: Go cinnte bheadh Osama Bin Laden ag gáirí
result.orig: Go cinnte bheadh Osama Bin Laden ag gáirí
result.html: Go cinnte bheadh Osama Bin Laden ag gáiríOsama Bin Laden would certainly be laughing.
result.ponchtml: Go cinnte ḃeaḋ Osama Bin Laden ag gáiríOsama Bin Laden would certainly be laughing.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.html: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeifeá ag súil leis an doiṁneaċt ċéanna tuairimíoċta uaṫu is a ḃeaḋ ó ṗostálaċa níba ḟaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar Ṡeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.ga: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí

result.html: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaíWhen everybody was asleep...
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeaḋ an saol fá ċónaíWhen everybody was asleep...

result.eng: It would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
result.ga: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
